short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download selected images as a photo collage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download selected online image as a photo collage
User can specify the max number of photo on one row.

How To Use:
1.Open the webpage and click to activate the extension.
2.Click the floating circle on top right.
3.Select images your want
4.Click download collage
